main.name: Hi This is Subham
main.description: I’m experienced in highly driven and well-versed in Restful architecture. As a part of experience I have built highly scalable web app API's that scaled to over large no of users and drove the product vision as specified by the organization. I am a quick learner with diverse area of experience in start up eco system too
main.bio: I am working as a full stack developer Intern in TS Digisol. I work extensively in field of full stack technology as React Js for front end web development and also React Native for Mobile app development.

Deployed application with CI/CD deployment method too.

Responsible for testing the NESA application’s image processing algorithm and structuring the same for the development team.
